import React from 'react'; import {Card,CardContent,Typography,Grid} from '@material-ui/core'; import CountUp from 'react-countup'; import styles from './Cards.module.css'; const Cards =({data:{confirmed,recovered,deaths,lastUpdate}}) => { if (!confirme) { return 'Loading....'; } return (
Infected {new Date(lastUpdate).toDateString()} Number of active cases of COVID-19 Recovered {new Date(lastUpdate).toDateString()} Number of active cases of COVID-19 Deaths {new Date(lastUpdate).toDateString()} Number of active cases of COVID-19
); } export default Cards;
